content.value:
Chapinero Hills is located in the financial district of Bogotá. A strategic point for you to know and enjoy the gastronomic, cultural and historical variety of this wonderful city. Chapinero Hills Hostel 200 m away from two of the main gastronomic areas of Bogota as the g zone that has a great variety of restaurants.

We have dorms and private rooms. All rooms are non-smoking. The WiFi covers the entire building. At the guest house each room has a shared bathroom.

Chapinero Hills Hostel in Bogotá provides adults-only accommodation with a bar and a shared lounge. The property is located 3.3 km from El Campin Stadium, 3.7 km from T Zone and 8 km from Bolivar Square. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a tour desk and free WiFi throughout the property.

description.description: Chapinero Hills is a beautiful hostel full of design spaces and confortable accommodations to those who want to know the magic of Bogotá. Chapinero Hills Hostel is located in Chapinero district in one of the most traditional neighborhood in Bogota City and cultural interest zone, Quinta Camacho.
